document.full_text: dennis the menace, one of britain's most popular comic strip characters, turned 60 on thursday with president barack obama firmly in his mischievous sights.
document.title: dennis the menace, 60, awaits obama with glee
lines_and_colors: dennis the menace, one of britain's most popular comic strip characters, turned 60 on thursday with president barack obama firmly in his mischievous sights.
